title: Admin Portal Rebuild
project_description: Redeveloped the admin portal where employees can submit car rental requests. The system now routes approvals first to the supervisor, then to the administrative department, streamlining the workflow.

title: Raffle System Development
project_description: Built a fully manageable raffle system with the ability to upload Excel files for participant lists, improving usability and efficiency.

title: Helpdesk Enhancement
project_description: Enhanced the helpdesk system, enabling multiple departments to participate in user support. Departments can now manage their own services, employees, tickets, and customize the email content sent to users. It also allows departments to manage their own assets.

title: Asset Inventory Redevelopment
project_description: Revamped the asset inventory system for greater efficiency and faster interaction. Introduced a feature to assign specific computer parts and integrated QR code functionality for asset maintenance logs.

title: UI/UX Enhancement
project_description: Improved the user interface of the old design, creating a more interactive and cleaner experience for users.

title: Laravel Upgrade
project_description: Upgraded the application from Laravel 5.6 to 11, and conducted a comprehensive project directory cleanup to ensure codebase maintainability.

title: MV KPI
project_description: Developed an application for managing production reports in Cambodia and the Philippines, featuring dynamic updates, fast server interactions, and seamless report management.

title: Microsoft OAuth Integration
project_description: Integrated Entra ID for seamless authentication, eliminating delays in syncing Active Directory changes to the Luthas database and ensuring reliable login for both on-premises and cloud users.

title: Luenthai ChatBot
project_description: Developed an AI-powered chatbot using Gemini AI to assist users with inquiries, automate helpdesk ticket creation, and provide quick system interactions without navigating through multiple pages.

title: Warehouse Management System
project_description: Designed and developed a system for efficient warehouse stock management, enabling users to monitor and manage inventory in real time. Features include label printing for each stack, barcode/QR scanning for inventory tracking, and status updates (receiving, transferring, keeping, excess, disposal). Integrated with a management server for data verification and accuracy.
